name: Magnet Crush [GMTK 2021]
description:
My entry for the GMTK Jam 2021! Click anywhere to spawn magnets and use them to crash flies. Magnet force will take care of the rest.

The game has some bugs and doesn't really look good, but at least this was my first unity game and a game jam submission! I hope you will enjoy it for a minute or so.

Later in the development, I realized that using a grid system would've been much better, but it was way too late. Sorry for janky Unity physics!
